Name: The Vision Of The Ant
About the game: A monster-catching, dungeon-crawling RPG set in a dark fantasy world. Take on the role of Anza as he embarks on his journey to find the Archfiend Natas. Features: Catch Monsters and turn them into powerful allies. Take your monsters and fight your way through randomly generated dungeons and complete randomized quests. Explore three unique areas each with their own set of dangers. Play a game designed for players looking for a challenging but rewarding experience. Use Alchemy and create new items and equipment. 15-25 hours playtime.
